title: Riot Games Support - Login error!!
body:
Hello , i am not allowed to even go at the login page ,if i try to it takes me back to support then again back at login ( permanent loop , watched 2 mins of it ).
If i go on private mode i can press login , but after i input my data it loads and nothing happens , still can't see my tickets / make specific ones.
Rioters help!

replies.body: Hmmmmm it's definitely weird that it keeps redirecting you, and then not even working in a private window. I'd say try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) since it might be pulling your cookies and redirecting you because of that. You can also try using a different browser entirely if that doesn't help.

Thank you for answering!
I did that , it works fine until i input my data and login , after i login it still shows that I am not logged in , but when i try login(after i've already input my data and clicked login)  it just redirects me back to the riot support page..
It's very weird since it never happened before , it went smooth , it also shows that we website is online , so if you have any further instructions I am here.
The reason i want to make a ticket is for the alistar champion and skin , i already subbed to the yt channel so...since i can't make a ticket :<

EDIT: Thank you very much !
